Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to the definition of Vietnam veteran
Summary: Conforms the definition of a veteran serving in the Vietnam war era to newly enacted federal law (H.R. 7105) for veterans who served in-country in the Republic of Vietnam from between February 28, 1961 and April 30, 1975, to any active duty service in the Republic of Vietnam that occurred between November 1, 1955, and April 30, 1975.
LawCode: Amd §458-a, RPT L; amd §364, Exec L; amd §§668, 668-c & 669-a, Ed L; amd §2632, Pub Health L; amd §85, Civ Serv L; amd §63, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, the executive law, the education law, the public health law, the civil service law, and the public officers law, in relation to conforming the definition of a veteran serving in the Vietnam war era to newly enacted federal law (H.R. 7105) for veterans who served in-country in the Republic of Vietnam from between February 28, 1961 and April 30, 1975, to any active duty service in the Republic of Vietnam that occurred between November 1, 1955 and April 30, 1975
